metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6640 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The prctl_set_vma_anon_name function in kernel/sys.c in Android before5.1.1 LMY49F and 6.0 before 2016-01-01 does not ensure that only one vma isaccessed in a certain update action, which allows attackers to gainprivileges or cause a denial of service (vma list corruption) via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 20017123.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
